register.termsTitle: Terms of Service and User Agreement for Community Garden Planner
register.termsIntro: Welcome to the Community Garden Planner ecosystem. By accessing our platform, utilizing our planning tools, or engaging with our community features, you acknowledge that you are entering into a binding legal agreement. These Terms govern your use of our website, mobile application, and all related services. Please read the following document meticulously to understand your rights and responsibilities.
register.termsAcceptanceText: By creating an account, accessing, or strictly using the Community Garden Planner services, you unequivocally accept and agree to be bound by the terms, conditions, and notices contained or referenced in this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms in their entirety, you are not authorized to access the website or use any of our services, and you must discontinue use immediately.
register.termsAccountText: To access the full functionality of our planning tools and community forums, you must register for a personalized user account. You agree to provide true, accurate, current, and complete information about yourself as prompted by our registration forms. Furthermore, you are obligated to maintain and promptly update your registration data to keep it accurate. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account details, and you accept full responsibility for all activities that occur under your account context. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
register.termsPrivacyText: Your privacy is of paramount importance to us. We are committed to protecting your personal data and maintaining transparency regarding how your information is handled. We collect, store, and process your information strictly in accordance with our comprehensive Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to such processing and warrant that all data provided by you is accurate. You understand that through your use of the service, you consent to the collection and use of this information for storage, processing, and improvement of the Community Garden Planner platform.
register.termsContentText: You retain full ownership and intellectual property rights to any text, images, garden layouts, or other materials you submit, post, or display on or through the platform. However, by posting content, you grant Community Garden Planner a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, copy, reproduce, process, adapt, modify, publish, transmit, display, and distribute such content in any and all media or distribution methods now known or later developed, primarily for the purpose of operating, promoting, and improving our services.
register.termsCommunity: Code of Conduct and Community Guidelines
register.termsCommunityText: Our platform thrives on collaboration and mutual respect. You agree to use the platform solely for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the platform. You are strictly prohibited from posting content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, or hateful. We reserve the absolute right to remove any content that violates these terms and to suspend or terminate accounts that repeatedly violate our community guidelines without prior notice.
register.termsLiability: Disclaimer of Warranties and Limitation of Liability
register.termsLiabilityText: The Community Garden Planner service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. We do not guarantee that the service will function without interruption or errors, or that the service is free of viruses or other harmful components. In no event shall Community Garden Planner be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses resulting from your use or inability to use the platform.
register.termsChangesText: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms and Conditions at any time to reflect changes in the law, our data collection and use practices, the features of our services, or advances in technology. We will provide notice of substantial changes by posting the updated terms on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of the Community Garden Planner platform following the posting of any changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes.

home.subtitle: Connect with local gardeners, manage tasks, track your garden, and grow together üå±
home.aboutDescription: Community Garden Planner is a platform designed to help you manage your garden and connect with local gardeners. In the platform, you can create and manage your own garden, track tasks, ask gardening questions to experts, and even connect with other gardeners in your area. Our goal is to foster recreational gardening, community engagement, and environmental awareness. Join the community today and let's make a difference together!
